message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your value for the product. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value the product at a higher price point. Could you meet me halfway at $102?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $100 for the product.
